attributes.action: Encourage new house contractors to undertake more environmental building techniques, and support them by cutting the price of more eco-friendly materials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should make it easy for people or companies building new properties or extending a building, by cutting taxes on environmental materials and appliances such as ground source heat pumps.
Also for new environmental solutions to be tax free and receive funding to improve the technology.
